result.title: Feasibility study for introducing resistance to stem rust into EU wheat material
result.description: A report on the sources of stem rust resistance which could be appropriate for European wheat breeding, their likely stability, and ease of incorporation into breeding materials. The report will also draw on outputs from international stem rust screening initiatives
